mainText:
He lived life.
He achieveid whatever he wanted to, by hard work, skill and enthusiasm.
He loved his work, his field, his responsibility.
I hope he told his family all they needed to know, all he wanted them  
to know.
He connected my dots.
I hope, and think, he connected his own.

His ideas and passion will far outlive him.
header: A collection of ideas more than a man
author: Prenen
